name: Papilios
tag_list: staging, photography, real-estate, virtual-staging, virtual-home-staging, interstaging, floor-plan
overview:
Mission: To produce consistent, high quality real estate photography that significantly and positively influence the interest of potential home buyers.

Vision: Papilios envisions making shopping for properties over the internet an enjoyable experience for investors around the world.

Values: Papilios is an innovative and dynamic company with European traditions based on five core values: 

.: Integrity â€“ in business affairs and as a part of society.
.: Expertise â€“ through high standards of quality and professionalism.
.: Value creation â€“ for real estates and employees.
.: Commitment â€“ to real estateâ€™s financial affairs.
.: Accessibility â€“ electronic and physical.

These values act as guidelines and as quality parameters in our day-to-day work and in staff performance. We constantly strive to develop and improve a cooperative partnership attitude with our customers and staff. This synergy to share common goals is crucial for Papilios as an innovative, dynamic and inspirational organization.

Partners: Our experienced business partners from Europe and Asia create continuity and consistency through state-of-the-art floor plan design programs and real estate photograph editing. Using world-wide business partners generates flexibility and fast delivery service for our costumers. We have many Real Estate business partners in the United States, including a strong partnership with many Keller Williams associates. Quality photography is one of the best ways that Realtors and home sellers can gain the competitive advantage necessary to make their property stand out from the competition. High-quality photographs, combined with a great targeted marketing plan, can make multiple price reductions unnecessary.
